sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SEPULCHRE, Knights of the Holy, an English military order which was said to date from the 12th century and which became extinct at the Reformation. A similar order, founded in France, lasted from the end of the 15th century till the time of the Revolution; it was resuscitated by Louis XVIII. in 1814, but again became extinct in 1830.
